reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, particularly in Texas heat, and appreciate its lightweight fabric and versatility for both casual and office settings.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Well made and super cute! Cheap, yet it is still good quality cotton; not see thru and thick. True to size and super comfy Read more
items.author: molya

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish cool summer dress
items.body: Oversized light purplish stripes. Feels cool & comfy against skin. Tight button holes stay secure. Wrinkles a little but goes away . Washes & partially dries without shrinking. Hang out of dryer - no ironing or steaming necessary. Breathable generous fit. Dress shirt thickness - not see through ! Read more
items.author: Daily Browser

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Big and comfortable.
items.body: It runs VERY big. I could and should have sized down at least a size. And, if I cared more I would have returned it, but since I only want it to be comfy, it’s fine. I wore it to wear after abdomen surgery and it’s really great for that. Looking put together but still comfortable. It’s super easy to wear, it isn’t too thick, and the color is very nice. Read more
items.author: Aleigh

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit of an A-line cut would do wonders
items.body: I bought this caftan/wearable tent for my mum, who wanted something cool, light and oversized to wear after showering during the warmer months when her condo reaches scary-hot indoor temps. Unlike the issues other reviewers had regarding poor construction, the garment we received was sewn well and the buttons all securely attached, though we had to invest some time in removing stay threads, which wasn't unexpected. The fabric wasn't scratchy as some others reported, and it will likely soften over time. My mother is hoping it that it will also shrink. So many garments -- even those sold under major brand names -- are now made overseas, and in different locations (because it's always wise to diversify your supply chain), even if the manufacturers are creating the same style/model garments. As a result, sizing and quality can differ widely, and that's possibly the reason the quality of these garments is so all over the place. Anyone who's made repeat purchases of their favorite bras and knickers or other apparel has probably been disappointed in the huge quality and sizing difference from one repeat order to another. Kudos to those who shared photos where they made this otherwise shapeless garment look almost chic. My otherwise fashionable mum chose a lager size than she'd normally wear, so we had a good laugh at how it magically transformed her into a frumpy-dumpy matron. If only it had even a bit of an A-line cut instead of straight all the way from top to bottom, it might give it more movement at the hem and eliminate the ballooning effect in the midriff area. My mum is 5'5" and the hem brushes the top of her feet. And the mid-section made her look like she'd instantly developed a man's very generous beer belly. Good for a giggle, but not exactly flattering. She's hoping a very hot wash will make it shrink a bit both in width and length, because she's decided to keep it as she'll only be wearing it in private, and it should at least be something cool to wear in the summer after a shower or a swim. Read more
items.author: Marinite

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress Great Look
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Positive reviews supported my decision to purchase this. I was not disappointed. I’m between a size 12 & 14. After reading it was quite oversized, I went with a medium. Although it fits, it’s more of a regular shirt dress than the relaxed look I wanted. It does get narrow around stomach and hip area, but it wasn’t all that full on top. It isn’t sheer, however, you can see the outline of your legs when the light hits. Overall, well made, good quality fabric, nice design, wonderful pockets and very well priced. May reorder another color in the large to achieve the right look Read more
items.author: CBuyer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for good price
items.body: Loved the quality and look of this 100% cotton dress. Will use it as a beach/swim cover up. Read more
items.author: NEEOD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gray and White striped dress with pockets
items.body: Bought this for my mother after she fractured her ribs and needed a button down dress. It’s super spacious, long and easy to get dressed in. There is a label indicating 100% cotton, made in China. No dye color running during cold water wash. It is soft and comfortable for lounging or for day wear. Delivery was quick with the targeted delivery date. The dress is too long for someone that is 5’0”. I hemmed it 2” and it falls just below the ankle. She likes it and would recommend it. Read more
items.author: KB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Has Batwing sleeves.
items.body: Fabric is nice with a comfortable feel when wearing it. Stitching is well made. Good to wear during warm and hot months. Minimum wrinkling. The sleeves are a batwing type of sleeve (with a deep, low armhole) making a very loose fit at the armhole and gives space to the breast area. Sizing is difficult to guess. I’m 5’6” and length is good for me. I weigh 140 pounds with 34B bra size, bought medium size and I could have gone for the small size and still have a very loose fit so choose sizing according to the look you want to achieve. I was looking for a long shirt type of dress cut but the add photo or dress specifications doesn’t show or mention the batwing sleeves. You can always style it wearing a long necklace or a loose belt if you have from flat to minimum stomach. It will probably need light ironing after a cold water wash. Read more
items.author: C. Aguirre

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Orange Pink, Pink, Blue, Purple, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
